REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2088 reute a f BC-MINNESOTA-LASER-INTRO 04-09 0058

TEXT.TITLE: MINNESOTA LASER INTRODUCES NEW SURGICAL LASERS
TEXT.BODY: Minnesota Laser Corp said it introduced a new line of Coagulase Series Nd:YAG surgical laser systems. It said the lasers use 400 micron fiberoptics designed for endoscopic, microscopic and freehand surgical applications in gynecology, urology, gastroenterology and pulmonology. Reuter
